Author: dethleib
Text: Curious what kind of magick...? Example, If you are setting unhealthy goals for yourself, it is harming you, the wiccan rede speaks specifically against causing harm by magick. I'd be pretty weary of messing around with any supernatural forces without a full understanding of appropriate ritual and potential consequences.

Author: genericdietcola
Text: I’m sure you could research weight loss spells. I like to create spells of my own, they’re more effective and personal that way.  If you make sigils, those are the most fun and effective for me. If you use herbs, anything that’s typically used in weight loss recipes, like cayenne, cinnamon, lemon, mint etc. for candles I would do white for purity (emptiness) and if you include tarot cards either progress, or even loss?
